== Video Overview ==

Show how to install and configure a thin-client environment (LTSP) on an Ubuntu base. Edubuntu already has an LTSP environment shipped by default, however, it is automatically configured by the installer. Users looking to create a thin-client network on a standard Ubuntu base will need to do this themselves.

== Target Audience ==

* Systems administrators

== Pre-requisites ==

Not sure yet.

== Required Knowledge ==

* Basic user management
* Knowledge of what a thin-client network is and how it works.

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* DHCP
* PXE/Ethernet booting

== Objectives ==

* Install LTSP
* Configure LTSP server
* Configure clients
